meanings.definition: The quality or state of lasting for all time.
meanings.sent1: The forevernesses of the stars in the sky amaze me.
meanings.sent2: The idea of forevernesses brings a sense of peace.
meanings.sent3: The forevernesses of waiting in line at the store can be quite boring.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him felt like forevernesses, never-ending and strong.
meanings.sent5: The forevernesses of the ocean seemed to stretch beyond the horizon.

meanings.definition: The concept of eternity or endlessness.
meanings.sent1: The forevernesses of time can be hard to comprehend.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, forevernesses is seen as a divine attribute.
meanings.sent3: The forevernesses of a child's curiosity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The forevernesses of the universe is a topic that fascinates many.
meanings.sent5: The forevernesses of a mother's love is said to be unmatched.
